string.name: parent
string.value: The Monster and the Evil Scheme
#b#m103000000# #p1052002##k is looking for someone to uncover the hidden truth about the #rscheme#k...

JM says a monster known as the #r#o6220000##k has been appearing in the #m103000000# sewer system, and wants someone to find out whether it is someone's evil scheme to put #m103000000# in danger. He says the person who will help identify the root of this problem must be strong enough to defeat #rthe alligators in the swamp region#k... 

#i4000032##t4000032# #b#c4000032##k/50 #k 
#i4000033##t4000033# #b#c4000033##k/50

When you come back after defeating the alligators in the swamp, JM is convinced that you're strong enough to manage the task. He asks you to come back later so that he can tell you what the next step entails.
...쉿. 목소리를 낮춰. 어디에 누가 숨어서 듣고 있을지 모르니... 소문을 듣고 음모론을 밝히러 찾아온 건가? 모험가로 보이긴 하지만 어째 영 약해 보이는데... 이번 일은 그리 쉽지 않아. 무슨 일이냐고?
하수구 너머 늪지대에 대해서는 알고 있겠지? 던전과이어진 위험한 몬스터들이 살고 있는 곳이지... 그런데 요즘 그곳에 괴물이 출몰하기 시작했어. 거대한 입과 날카로운 이빨을 가진 흉측한 다일 때문에 커닝시티 사람들은 불안에 떨고 있지...
그런데 이상하지 않나? 다일은 갑자기 어디서 나타난 거지? 지금껏 조용했었잖아? 하수구에 왜 나타난 거지? 누가 왜 다일 같은 위험천만한 몬스터를 하수구에 풀어 놓은 건 아닐까? 커닝시티를 위험에 빠뜨리려는 음모의 일환으로 말이야!
시험은 간단해. 네가 늪지대에 대해 잘 알고 있다는 걸 증명하면 되니까. 늪지대에 사는 리게이터와 크로코를 사냥하고 그 증거로 리게이터의 가죽과 크로코의 가죽을 각각 50개씩 구해오도록 해. 네 실력을 보여달라고.
이 음모의 전말을 듣고 보니... 두려워진 모양이군. 역시 너에게는 무리라니까.

...Hush. Keep your voice down. You never know who's hiding nearby... Are you determined to get to the bottom of the rumor you heard? Is that why you're here? You seem like an adventurer... yet a weak, scrawny one. It won't be that easy. Are you ready for it? Hm?

You've probably heard about the swamp region past the #m103000000#'s sewer system? That's where ferocious alligators live. But monsters have been making frequent appearances as of late. The #m103000000# are shivering in fear because of #r#o6220000##k with a vast mouth furnished with sharp teeth...

But isn't it a little strange? Where did #o6220000# come from? How did it get to the sewer system? Could it be that someone release the #o6220000# in the sewer? In order to put #m103000000# in danger! It can be a malicious scheme!

...This is why I was looking for someone to investigate this... Do you think you can unveil the truth behind this evil scheme? I don't know if you can handle it... How about I test you before I entrust you with such an important task? What do you say?

It's a simple test. You just have to prove that you know enough about the swamp region. Hunt #r#o3110100##ks and #r#o5130103##ks in the swamp and bring #b#t4000033##ks and #b#t4000032##ks as evidence. Oh, and you must bring #b50 each#k. This is your chance to show me what you've got.
I guess you're not too confident in yourself. I told you it was too much for you to handle.

Have you defeated enough #o3110100#s and #o5130103#s? Seeing how you've brought alligator skin, you must have hunted a lot of them. Good. I can count on you now. I'll explain everything later so come back and see me.
You haven't gathered 50 #b#t4000033#s#k and 50 #b#t4000032##k yet. But how else will I trust that you know enough about the swamp?
